title: MICROSOFT EXPANDS ITS COMMITMENT TO EDUCATION WITH ELEVATE FOR EDUCATORS PROGRAM AND NEW AI-POWERED TOOLS

title: RUBICON CARBON TO SUPPLY MICROSOFT WITH TWO MILLION TONNES OF CARBON REMOVAL CREDITS FROM KIJANI FORESTRY PROJECT
text: MARINA DEL REY, CALIF.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--RUBICON CARBON, A VERTICALLY INTEGRATED CARBON CREDIT INVESTMENT AND MANAGEMENT FIRM, SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO DELIVER TWO MILLION HIGH-QUALITY AFFORESTATION, REFORESTATION, AND REVEGETATION (ARR) CREDITS TO MICROSOFT OVER NINE YEARS.
